snippet: LAMPARELLO--Julia J. The members of the Department of Surgery mourn the loss of Mrs. Julia J. Lamparello beloved mother of our esteemed and long time faculty member Dr. Patrick Lamparello. We extend our deepest condolences to Dr. Lamparello and his family on their loss. H. Leon Pachter M.D., F.A.C.S The George David Stewart Professor and Chair Department of Surgery NYU Langone Medical Center 1/3
lead_paragraph: LAMPARELLO--Julia J. The members of the Department of Surgery mourn the loss of Mrs. Julia J. Lamparello beloved mother of our esteemed and long time faculty member Dr. Patrick Lamparello. We extend our deepest condolences to Dr. Lamparello and his family on their loss. H. Leon Pachter M.D., F.A.C.S The George David Stewart Professor and Chair Department of Surgery NYU Langone Medical Center 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LAMPARELLO, JULIA J
